name: miniSlide
description:
miniSlide is a tutorial project as I learn more about using and interacting with Unity API. It is pieced together from various tutorials and resources on my journey to making games. This page is primarily for some friends who want to test things out and provide feedback on things that are working.

You can download my projects for free or choose to become a patreon/subscriber or even send a tip. Funds go towards purchasing new assets and tools to further the GameDev journey.
